details.history: The dungeon was created by dwarves as a mine. It became the site of a great miracle, and has lain empty for many years until recently.

hidden_treasure: Hidden (DC 20 to find) Unlocked Good Wooden Chest (15 hp)

2300 cp, 1000 sp, 100 gp, 2 x diamond (50 gp), carnelian (50 gp), chalcedony (50 gp), chrysoprase (50 gp), 4 x moonstone (50 gp), quartz (50 gp), zircon (50 gp), +1 Weapon (dart) (uncommon, dmg 213), +1 Weapon (sling) (uncommon, dmg 213)
monster: Ogre Zombie (cr 2, mm 316) and 1 x Zombie (cr 1/4, mm 316); deadly, 500 xp

    affects all targets within a 20 ft. cone, DC 12 save or take 2d10 fire damage
